name: Survarium - Explorer Pack
detailed_description:
Exploring the dangerous New World of Survarium takes a lot of risk and challenge. Be prepared to start your jorney by setting off on a Team Mission with this Explorer Pack.

-Includes-

3 Access Keys

Use the Access Keys to play Team Missions or to respawn instantly when killed during the playthrough.

50 Spare Parts

Use spare parts to upgrade and modify your weapons and gear in Survarium.

short_description: Exploring the dangerous New World of Survarium takes a lot of risk and challenge. Be prepared to start your jorney by setting off on a Team Mission with this Explorer Pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista (Service Pack 2 + Platform update), Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0 GHz or Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4200+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game does not support Windows XP!
